courses.description: The NEET Online Coaching is best for your NEET Exam preparation. Physics Wallah comes up with the best NEET online coaching for aspirants. The PW NEET Online Coaching Program provides students with the best and most affordable courses. The best faculty for the NEET Exam is there for you with the best online courses for the NEET. The live and affordable NEET online coaching will prepare you for the most renounced medical exam.

Batch_details.qns: Who should join this batch?
Batch_details.ans: This batch is for students who is targeting the NEET Exam [ PHYSICS]

Batch_details.qns: When will the course be completed?
Batch_details.ans: March 28

Batch_details.qns: Is this batch FREE or PAID?
Batch_details.ans: This is a Paid batch. You need to click on the “BUY NOW” option to get this batch on the PW App.

Batch_details.qns: Will classes be live or recorded?
Batch_details.ans: Classes will be Live and recorded both of you can access them.

Batch_details.qns: Classes will stream on which channel?
Batch_details.ans: PW app.

Batch_details.qns: How to get Lecture Notes?
Batch_details.ans: These will be available under the Classroom Section of the batch in PW App

Batch_details.qns: In which language the class notes will be provided?
Batch_details.ans: Class notes will provide you with the English and Hindi language.

Batch_details.qns: For any query how to contact?
Batch_details.ans: For Any query contact us at 7019243492.

Batch_details.qns: Can I get a refund after the batch purchase?
Batch_details.ans: Dear student, a refund after batch purchase is not allowed as we have already invested a lot in providing the best learning experience to our loving students regarding tech infrastructure, employee salary, etc. Please make a conscious decision before purchasing a batch
